name: Messy Infiltration
description:
Greetings Commander! Your Operator is in great danger!
His Equipment is broken and he is deep in the enemy Database.
Luckily we got a clear image on him, but he is basically blind.
You have to help him, through the base, step by step.

The stealth suit is damaged as well. It works... kinda.
When activated the enemy Guards won't see him,
however... we also will loose visual on our Operator.

Hurry Commander! Our Operator needs your guidance.
